text: Zenjitsu (made) kare no tachiba o urayande ita-sha-tachi wa, ii hajimeta. `A , hontoni arra wa, o nozomi no shimo be-tachi ni, oku mo, mata sukunaku mo, megumareru (koto ga wakatta). Arra no fukai o megumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi-tachi mo kitto (ji no naka ni) umatte itadearou. A, fushinjin no mono-tachi wa, kesshite seiko shinai koto ga wakarimashita
